about_the_game:
In a chilling moment, your phone rings with an anonymous caller saying they are about to take their own life. Faced with this critical situation, what will you do? Will you embark on a mission to rescue them from the depths of despair? Move quickly because time is running out.

    IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE
    Semi-realistic graphics, minimal user interfaces, and a creepy ambience work together to create an immersive experience.

    SOLVE PUZZLES
    Puzzles and clues serve as gateways to uncover the hidden truth. Whether deciphering cryptic messages or navigating surreal mindscapes, every puzzle is designed to be mentally stimulating and integral to the progression of the narrative.

    UNIQUE LEVELS
    Embark on a journey across three different floors, each with increasing difficulty. To complete each floor, you must unlock the stairway exit and enter it. Each floor features new puzzles, clues, and sounds that will help you reach your final destination to save a life.

    RANDOMIZED JUMPSCARES
    This element of surprise ensures that no two playthroughs are ever the same. Brace yourself for the unexpected as every corner turned and every dark corridor becomes a potential breeding ground for heart-pounding moments.

    DISTURBING SOUNDTRACK
    With a haunting musical score and meticulously designed sound effects that intensify the atmosphere, the soundscape will create a sense of dread and unease, ensuring you that you will remain on the edge of your seat

content_descriptors.notes: CONTENT WARNING: This game contains depictions of self-harm and suicide.

    IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 340 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs

name: THANATOS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) , Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 340 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • VR Support: No

short_description: THANATOS is a first-person psychological horror mystery game that involves finding clues, solving puzzles, and uncovering secrets to prevent a friend from taking their own life.
